db:abstract.db:para: The QTextEncoder class provides a state-based encoder.

db:note.db:para: All functions in this class are reentrant.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A text encoder converts text from Unicode into an encoded text format using a specific codec.
The encoder converts Unicode into another format, remembering any state that is required between calls.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QTextEncoder::QTextEncoder(const QTextCodec *codec)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a text encoder for the given codec.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.7] QTextEncoder::QTextEncoder(const QTextCodec *codec, QTextCodec::ConversionFlags flags)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a text encoder for the given codec and conversion flags.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.7.

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QTextEncoder::fromUnicode(const QString &str)
db:section.db:para: Converts the Unicode string str into an encoded QByteArray.

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QTextEncoder::fromUnicode(const QChar *uc, int len)
db:section.db:para: Converts len characters (not bytes) from uc, and returns the result in a QByteArray.
